Issue.Title: RadGridView databinding issue
Issue.Description: RadGridView does not display columns from dataset
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Bind the grid to a dataset with tables

Issue.Title: RadGridView save/load layout issue
Issue.Description: RadGridView does not save the columns correctly
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Non-visible columns are also being saved

Issue.Title: RadDropDownList add functionality for multiselect
Issue.Description: Add functionality to RadDropDownList to support multiselect

Issue.Title: RadCalendar add month picker functionality
Issue.Description: Add functionality to RadCalendar to support month selection

Issue.Title: RadTextBox focus issue
Issue.Description: The Focus() method of the control does not work

Issue.Title: RadTextBox BackColor property is not taken into cosideration
Issue.Description: The control backcolor property is not taken into consideration
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Try to set a backcolor through the control BackColor property

Issue.Title: RadMaskEditBox add phone mask
Issue.Description: Add new mask to support phone number format

Issue.Title: RadDateTimePicker add month and year picker functionality
Issue.Description: Add month and year picker modes

Issue.Title: RadTreeView demo appearance glitches
Issue.Description: The node borders appear in double size
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Open the application from Demo > RadTreeView > First Look

Issue.Title: RadDateTimePicker demo exeption
Issue.Description: The application in Demo > RadDateTimePicker throws an exception in multiselect mode
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Open the demo, select the multiselect option, expand the drop down and click on a date

Issue.Title: Create new application for to demo POS
RadGridView layout issue
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Open bound RadGridView and observe the top border with ControlDefault theme

Issue.Title: RadDropDownList items font size is incorrect
Issue.Description: The font size is 9.5 and it should be 8.25
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Open the dropdown with some items loaded and apply the Windows7 theme

Issue.Title: RadCalendar displays SpecialDays incorrect
Issue.Description: SpecialDays size and color is incorrect
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Load the Office2010Blue theme and observe the SpecialDays appearance.

Issue.Title: RadProgreeBar shows no border
Issue.StepsToReproduce: Load progress bar with Office2010Black theme

Issue.Title: Create new Telerik theme
Issue.Description: The new theme should be in metro style
